cause.description:
Have you ever walked down the street only to see a really ugly person..and then found yourself throwing up everywhere.. yes im sure we all have had that.. well now through your support you guys can put an end to it..!! help us get 1million paper bags.. no infact help yourselves by helping us get 1million bags..
1. Hide Ugly people
cause.mission: Produce 1million paper bags for ugly people to put over there faces
cause.name: HTF - Hide That Face
